sqlMap.statement: SELECT AP_INV_CATG_CD , AP_INV_CATG_DESC_TXT FROM AP_INV_CATG WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY AP_INV_CATG_SORT_NUM ASC

SELECT MAIN.AP_INV_CATG_DESC_TXT , MAIN.AP_VND_INV_NUM , MAIN.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , MAIN.INV_DT , MAIN.INV_AUTH_DT , MAIN.PRNT_VND_CD , MAIN.DPLY_VND_NM , MAIN.AP_VND_CD , MAIN.VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT , MAIN.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT , MAIN.INV_HDR_DESC_TXT , MAIN.ACCT_INV_STS_CD , MAIN.ACCT_INV_STS_DESC_TXT , DECODE(MAIN.PO_NUM, #none#, NULL, MAIN.PO_NUM) PO_NUM , MAIN.PO_APVL_DT , DECODE(MAIN.VND_RTRN_NUM, #none#, NULL, MAIN.VND_RTRN_NUM) VND_RTRN_NUM , MAIN.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT , DECODE(MAIN.DELY_ORD_NUM, #none#, NULL, MAIN.DELY_ORD_NUM) DELY_ORD_NUM , MAIN.AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM , MAIN.AP_LINE_TP_DESC_TXT , MAIN.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT , MAIN.AC_INV_JRNL_COST_AMT , MAIN.AC_SC_TAX_AMT , MAIN.AP_ACCT_DESC_TXT , MAIN.XX_CMNT_TXT , MAIN.PO_QTY , MAIN.INV_RCV_QTY , MAIN.AP_BILL_QTY , MAIN.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM , MAIN.ARCS_PMT_DT , MAIN.CONTR_NUM , MAIN.CUST_DLR_CD , MAIN.SER_NUM , MAIN.CSMP_INV_NUM , MAIN.ISTL_LOC_CTY_ADDR , MAIN.DISP_PO_DTL_LINE_NUM , MAIN.EZINTIME XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_TS , MAIN.EZINUSERID XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_BY_NM , MAIN.EZUPTIME XX_REC_HIST_UPD_TS , MAIN.EZUPUSERID XX_REC_HIST_UPD_BY_NM , MAIN.EZTABLEID XX_REC_HIST_TBL_NM FROM ( SELECT AIC.AP_INV_CATG_DESC_TXT , HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM , HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , HDR.INV_DT , CASE WHEN HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD IN (#acctInvStsL#, #acctInvStsP#, #acctInvStsV#) THEN HDR.INV_AUTH_DT ELSE NULL END INV_AUTH_DT , PV.PRNT_VND_CD , PV.PRNT_VND_NM || ' - ' || V.LOC_NM AS DPLY_VND_NM , HDR.AP_VND_CD , VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT , HDR.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT , HDR.INV_HDR_DESC_TXT , HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD , AIS.ACCT_INV_STS_DESC_TXT
, CAID.PO_NUM , PO.PO_APVL_DT
, DTL.VND_RTRN_NUM , VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT , CAID.DELY_ORD_NUM , NVL(CAID.AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM, DTL.AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM) AS AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM , ALT.AP_LINE_TP_DESC_TXT , CAID.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT , CASE WHEN DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD = #apLineTpItem# THEN NVL(CAID.AC_SC_FOB_COST_AMT, DTL.AC_INV_JRNL_COST_AMT) WHEN DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD <> #apLineTpItem# THEN DTL.AC_INV_JRNL_COST_AMT END AC_INV_JRNL_COST_AMT
, CAID.AC_SC_TAX_AMT , CA.COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT AP_ACCT_DESC_TXT , DECODE ( DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD , NULL , NULL , DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD ) XX_CMNT_TXT , CAID.PO_QTY , CAID.INV_RCV_QTY , DTL.AP_BILL_QTY , HDR.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM , HDR.ARCS_PMT_DT , DTL.CONTR_NUM , DTL.CUST_DLR_CD , DTL.SER_NUM , DTL.CSMP_INV_NUM , DTL.ISTL_LOC_CTY_ADDR , NVL(PD.DISP_PO_DTL_LINE_NUM, VRD.TRX_LINE_NUM) DISP_PO_DTL_LINE_NUM , DTL.EZINTIME , DTL.EZINUSERID , DTL.EZUPTIME , DTL.EZUPUSERID , DTL.EZTABLEID FROM CM_AP_INV_HDR HDR , CM_INV_ACCT_DIST DTL , PRNT_VND PV , VND V , VND_PMT_TERM VPT , VND_PMT_METH VPM , ACCT_INV_STS AIS , AP_LINE_TP ALT , PO PO , AP_INV_CATG AIC , CM_AP_INV_DTL CAID , COA_ACCT CA , PO_DTL PD , VND_RTRN VR , VND_RTRN_DTL VRD
, ( SELECT GLBL_CMPY_CD ,AP_VND_CD ,AP_VND_INV_NUM ,AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM FROM CM_INV_ACCT_DIST DTL WHERE DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD = #variance#
AND DTL.AP_VND_CD LIKE #apVndCd#
AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM LIKE #apVndInvNum#
AND DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY GLBL_CMPY_CD ,AP_VND_CD ,AP_VND_INV_NUM ,AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM ) PO_VAL
WHERE HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = DTL.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = V.INV_VND_CD AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND V.PRNT_VND_PK = PV.PRNT_VND_PK
AND PV.PRNT_VND_CD LIKE #prntVndCd#
AND PV.PRNT_VND_NM LIKE #dplyVndNm#
AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND HDR.AP_VND_CD LIKE #apVndCd#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CM_INV_ACCT_DIST D WHERE HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND HDR.AP_VND_CD =D.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = D.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND D.PO_NUM LIKE #poNum#)
AND DTL.DELY_ORD_NUM LIKE #delyOrdNum#
AND PO.PO_APVL_DT >= #poDt_FR#
AND PO.PO_APVL_DT <= #poDt_TO#
AND PD.DISP_PO_DTL_LINE_NUM LIKE #dispPoDtlLineNum#
AND UPPER(VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT) LIKE #vndPmtTermDescTxt#
AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM LIKE #apVndInvNum#
AND HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD = #acctInvStsCd#
AND HDR.INV_DT >= #invDt_FR#
AND HDR.INV_DT <= #invDt_TO#
AND HDR.INV_AUTH_DT >= #invAuthDt_FR#
AND HDR.INV_AUTH_DT <= #invAuthDt_TO#
AND DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD >= #xxCmntTxt_FR#
AND DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD <= #xxCmntTxt_TO#
AND HDR.AP_INV_CATG_CD = #apInvCatgCd_S#
AND UPPER(VPM.VND_PMT_METH_DESC_TXT) LIKE #vndPmtMethDescTxt#
AND HDR.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM LIKE #apPmtChkNum#
AND HDR.ARCS_PMT_DT >= #pmtDt_FR#
AND HDR.ARCS_PMT_DT <= #pmtDt_TO#
AND HDR.PMT_HLD_FLG = 'Y' AND HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD != #acctInvStsCdCancelled#
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CM_INV_ACCT_DIST D WHERE HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND HDR.AP_VND_CD =D.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = D.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND D.VND_RTRN_NUM LIKE #vndRtrnNum#)
AND VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT >= #vndRtrnSubmtDt_FR#
AND VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT <= #vndRtrnSubmtDt_TO#
AND HDR.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT >= #acInvTotCostAmt_FR#
AND HDR.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT <= #acInvTotCostAmt_TO#
AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VPT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND HDR.VND_PMT_TERM_CD = VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_CD(+) AND '0' = VPT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VPM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND NVL(HDR.ARCS_PMT_METH_CD,PV.VND_PMT_METH_CD) = VPM.VND_PMT_METH_NM(+) AND '0' = VPM.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AIS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD = AIS.ACCT_INV_STS_CD(+) AND '0' = AIS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ALT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD = ALT.AP_LINE_TP_CD(+) AND 0 = ALT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.PO_NUM = PO.PO_ORD_NUM(+) AND '0' = PO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND HDR.AP_INV_CATG_CD = AIC.AP_INV_CATG_CD(+) AND '0' = AIC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CAID.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.AP_VND_CD = CAID.AP_VND_CD(+) AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM = CAID.AP_VND_INV_NUM(+) AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM = CAID.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM(+) AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM = CAID.AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM(+) AND DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD <> #variance# AND CAID.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD = CA.COA_ACCT_CD(+) AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CAID.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAID.PO_NUM = PD.PO_ORD_NUM(+) AND CAID.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM = PD.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM(+) AND PD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.VND_RTRN_NUM = VR.VND_RTRN_NUM(+) AND '0' = VR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND CAID.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAID.VND_RTRN_NUM = VRD.VND_RTRN_NUM(+) AND CAID.PO_ORD_DTL_LINE_NUM = VRD.TRX_LINE_NUM(+) AND VRD.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO_VAL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = PO_VAL.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = PO_VAL.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM = PO_VAL.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM
ORDER BY HDR.AP_VND_CD , HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM , HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , AP_VND_INV_LINE_NUM , TO_NUMBER(PD.DISP_PO_DTL_LINE_NUM) NULLS LAST ) MAIN WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#

SELECT AIC.AP_INV_CATG_DESC_TXT AP_INV_CATG_DESC_TXT , MAIN.AP_VND_CD AP_VND_CD , MAIN.AP_VND_INV_NUM AP_VND_INV_NUM , MAIN.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , CAIH.INV_DT INV_DT , CASE WHEN CAIH.ACCT_INV_STS_CD IN (#acctInvStsL#, #acctInvStsP#, #acctInvStsV#) THEN CAIH.INV_AUTH_DT ELSE NULL END INV_AUTH_DT , CAIH.PRNT_VND_CD PRNT_VND_CD , PV.PRNT_VND_NM || ' - ' || V.LOC_NM DPLY_VND_NM , CAIH.INV_HDR_DESC_TXT INV_HDR_DESC_TXT , AIS.ACCT_INV_STS_DESC_TXT ACCT_INV_STS_DESC_TXT , DECODE(CAIH.PO_NUM, #none#, NULL, CAIH.PO_NUM) PO_NUM , MAIN.PO_APVL_DT PO_APVL_DT , DECODE(CAIH.VND_RTRN_NUM, #none#, NULL, CAIH.VND_RTRN_NUM) VND_RTRN_NUM , MAIN.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT , CAIH.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT INV_AMT , CAIH.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM AP_PMT_CHK_NUM , CAIH.ARCS_PMT_DT ARCS_PMT_DT
, CASE WHEN CAIH.PO_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT NVL(SUM(DPD.ENT_PO_DTL_DEAL_NET_AMT),0) FROM PO_DTL DPD WHERE DPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DPD.PO_ORD_NUM = CAIH.PO_NUM AND DPD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
WHEN CAIH.VND_RTRN_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT NVL(SUM(DRD.DEAL_VND_RTRN_UNIT_PRC_AMT * DRD.RTRN_QTY),0) FROM VND_RTRN_DTL DRD WHERE DRD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DRD.VND_RTRN_NUM = CAIH.VND_RTRN_NUM AND DRD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ELSE 0 END AS ENT_PO_DTL_DEAL_NET_AMT , VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT , CAIH.EZINTIME XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_TS , CAIH.EZINUSERID XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_BY_NM , CAIH.EZUPTIME XX_REC_HIST_UPD_TS , CAIH.EZUPUSERID XX_REC_HIST_UPD_BY_NM , CAIH.EZTABLEID XX_REC_HIST_TBL_NM FROM ( SELECT CIPH.AP_VND_CD , CIPH.AP_VND_INV_NUM , CIPH.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , CIPH.PO_APVL_DT , CIPH.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT FROM ( SELECT INV.AP_VND_CD , INV.AP_VND_INV_NUM , INV.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , INV.PO_APVL_DT , INV.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT FROM ( SELECT HDR.AP_VND_CD , HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM , HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM , MAX(PO.PO_APVL_DT) PO_APVL_DT , MAX(VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT) VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT FROM CM_AP_INV_HDR HDR , CM_INV_ACCT_DIST DTL
, VND_PMT_TERM VPT
, VND_PMT_METH VPM , VND V
, PRNT_VND PV
, PO PO , VND_RTRN VR
, ( SELECT AP_VND_CD , AP_VND_INV_NUM , AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM FROM CM_INV_ACCT_DIST DTL WHERE DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DTL.AP_LINE_TP_CD = #variance#
AND DTL.AP_VND_CD LIKE #apVndCd#
AND DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM LIKE #apVndInvNum#
AND DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY AP_VND_CD ,AP_VND_INV_NUM ,AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM ) PO_VAL
WHERE HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = DTL.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = DTL.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM = DTL.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM AND HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DTL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND HDR.AP_VND_CD LIKE #apVndCd#
AND HDR.PRNT_VND_CD LIKE #prntVndCd#
AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND HDR.PRNT_VND_CD = PV.PRNT_VND_CD AND PV.PRNT_VND_NM LIKE #dplyVndNm# AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DTL.PO_NUM LIKE #poNum#
AND DTL.VND_RTRN_NUM LIKE #vndRtrnNum#
AND DTL.DELY_ORD_NUM LIKE #delyOrdNum#
AND PO.PO_APVL_DT >= #poDt_FR#
AND PO.PO_APVL_DT <= #poDt_TO#
AND VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT >= #vndRtrnSubmtDt_FR#
AND VR.VND_RTRN_SUBMT_DT <= #vndRtrnSubmtDt_TO#
AND HDR.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT >= #acInvTotCostAmt_FR#
AND HDR.AC_INV_TOT_COST_AMT <= #acInvTotCostAmt_TO#
AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM LIKE #apVndInvNum#
AND HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD = #acctInvStsCd#
AND HDR.INV_DT >= #invDt_FR#
AND HDR.INV_DT <= #invDt_TO#
AND HDR.INV_AUTH_DT >= #invAuthDt_FR#
AND HDR.INV_AUTH_DT <= #invAuthDt_TO#
AND DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD >= #xxCmntTxt_FR#
AND DTL.DR_COA_CMPY_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_BR_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CC_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_ACCT_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROD_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_CH_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_AFFL_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_PROJ_CD || '.' || DTL.DR_COA_EXTN_CD <= #xxCmntTxt_TO#
AND HDR.AP_INV_CATG_CD = #apInvCatgCd_S#
AND HDR.AP_PMT_CHK_NUM LIKE #apPmtChkNum#
AND HDR.ARCS_PMT_DT >= #pmtDt_FR#
AND HDR.ARCS_PMT_DT <= #pmtDt_TO#
AND HDR.PMT_HLD_FLG = 'Y' AND HDR.ACCT_INV_STS_CD != #acctInvStsCdCancelled#
AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VPT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND HDR.VND_PMT_TERM_CD = VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_CD(+) AND UPPER(VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_DESC_TXT) LIKE #vndPmtTermDescTxt# AND 0 = VPT.EZCANCELFLAG(+)
AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = V.INV_VND_CD(+) AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VPM.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND UPPER(VPM.VND_PMT_METH_DESC_TXT) LIKE #vndPmtMethDescTxt# AND NVL(HDR.ARCS_PMT_METH_CD,V.VND_PMT_METH_CD) = VPM.VND_PMT_METH_NM(+) AND VPM.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.PO_NUM = PO.PO_ORD_NUM(+) AND PO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND DTL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DTL.VND_RTRN_NUM = VR.VND_RTRN_NUM(+) AND VR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND HDR.AP_VND_CD = PO_VAL.AP_VND_CD AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM = PO_VAL.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM = PO_VAL.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM
GROUP BY HDR.AP_VND_CD , HDR.AP_VND_INV_NUM , HDR.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM ) INV ORDER BY INV.AP_VND_CD , INV.AP_VND_INV_NUM , INV.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM ) CIPH WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum# ) MAIN , CM_AP_INV_HDR CAIH , PRNT_VND PV , VND V , ACCT_INV_STS AIS , VND_PMT_TERM VPT , AP_INV_CATG AIC WHERE CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CAIH.AP_VND_CD = MAIN.AP_VND_CD AND CAIH.AP_VND_INV_NUM = MAIN.AP_VND_INV_NUM AND CAIH.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM = MAIN.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM AND CAIH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = V.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAIH.AP_VND_CD = V.VND_CD(+) AND V.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND V.PRNT_VND_PK = PV.PRNT_VND_PK(+) AND CAIH.PRNT_VND_CD = PV.PRNT_VND_CD(+) AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AIS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAIH.ACCT_INV_STS_CD = AIS.ACCT_INV_STS_CD(+) AND AIS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = VPT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAIH.VND_PMT_TERM_CD = VPT.VND_PMT_TERM_CD(+) AND VPT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CAIH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CAIH.AP_INV_CATG_CD = AIC.AP_INV_CATG_CD(+) AND AIC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY CAIH.AP_VND_CD , CAIH.AP_VND_INV_NUM , CAIH.AP_VND_INV_SQ_NUM
